short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate the price of gift card products
short.vi: Tính giá sản phẩm thẻ quà tặng

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Visa eGift Card is an extension that helps users select the desired product and quantity, then calculate the total value and display it as a Visa e-gift card.

Main feature:
Choose Product: Users can choose from a diverse list of products including book vouchers, gift cards...

Enter Quantity: Users can enter the quantity of products they want to buy.

Calculate Total Value: The application will automatically calculate the total value of the order based on the selected product and quantity.

Show Gift Card: After calculation, the app will display the total value of the order and detailed information about the Visa eGift Card gift card.

Simple Calculator: In addition to the gift card purchasing feature, the application also provides a simple calculator for users to conveniently calculate.
